sentences.en: ...information embroidered with colourful graphics and tied together by hypertext links.
sentences.cn: …饰以彩色图表并用超文本链接组合在一起的信息。

sentences.en: A hypertext system is mainly determined through non - linear links of information.
sentences.cn: 超文本系统主要通过信息的非线性链接决定.

sentences.en: A true hypertext expression for the postmodern age.
sentences.cn: 真正的后现代时期的超文本表示!

sentences.en: All links must be made into hypertext links and activated.
sentences.cn: 各个环节都必须制成超文本链接和启动.

sentences.en: An extension to hypertext to include graphics and audio.
sentences.cn: 包含图形和音频的超文本扩展.

sentences.en: Arguably the whole concept of hypertext - as - technology really started back the forties.
sentences.cn: 超文本即是科技这个具争议性的观念始于四十年代.

sentences.en: Browsera program for retrieving and viewing a hypertext document on the web.
sentences.cn: 用来阅读超级文本文献的程序叫做浏览器.

sentences.en: Certainly, Andreessen didn't think up using hypertext to link Internet documents.
sentences.cn: 当然,用超文本链接因特网文档并不是安德烈亚森发明的.

sentences.en: Hypertext - associational ( non - linear ) access to text - based information in a computer.
sentences.cn: 超文本,意指按人脑的联想思维方式 非线性 地组织管理信息的一种先进计算机技术.

sentences.en: Not surprisingly, hypertext has come under attack from traditional critics.
sentences.cn: 超文本小说已经遭到传统评论家的抨击,这不足为奇.

sentences.en: Program that helps in writing hypertext or multimedia applications.
sentences.cn: 帮助写超文本或多媒体应用程序的软件.

sentences.en: The Secure Hypertext Transfer Protocol ( HTTPS ) can provide more secure data transmission.
sentences.cn: 安全超文本传输协议 ( HTTPS ) 可以提供安全的数据传送.

sentences.en: The wizard is now starting your HyperText Template editor.
sentences.cn: 该向导正在启动超文本模板编辑器.

sentences.en: This book is, in fact, a very tame hypertext novel.
sentences.cn: 本书实际上是一本非常单调的超文本小说.

sentences.en: This class features hypertext student projects in the projects section.
sentences.cn: 此课程在专题区有超文本的学生专题.

sentences.en: XHTML stands for Extensible HyperText Markup Language.
sentences.cn: XHTML表示扩展超文本标记语言.

phrases.tran_cn: 超文本标记语言；超文本置标语言

trans.tran_en: a way of writing computer documents that makes it possible to move from one document to another by  clicking  on words or pictures, especially on the Internet
